== Welcome to Novosibirsk, Russia LoCo Team ==
=== Aims ===
Increasing amount of Ubuntu users in Novosibirsk and in region.
----
=== Primary Goals in Novosibirsk and region ===
* Supporting Linux users.
* Forwarding Ubuntu Linux into every activity sphere.
* Exchanging experience and resource between like-minders.
* Coordination Ubuntu societies in Novosibirsk.
* Distributing Ubuntu Linux on physical medium.
----
=== Members ===
See: http://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ru-loco-nsk/+members
